overview_of_class:
Introduction to the Novel

This class will (1) examine major theories of the novel, and (2) show some ways to read representative novels more profoundly.

The course serves as an introduction to graduate studies, but undergraduates may be admitted with permission of instructor.
name: Proseminar
title: WCAS SLAVIC 411-0-20 Proseminar
